Metaschema Framework Parent 0.12.0 API

Packages 
Package Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding
The core implementation of the metaschema binding framework.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.io
Provides core functionality for reading and writing instance data to and from bound objects.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.io.json
Supports reading and writing JSON instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.io.xml
Supports reading and writing XML instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.io.yaml
Supports reading and writing YAML instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.io.yaml.impl  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.model
Provides the core implementation of the Metaschema model (gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common) represented as Java class annotations (gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.model.annotations).
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.binding.model.annotations
Provides a set of annotations for associating Metaschema information with a Java class.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.util  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.codegen
Support for generating "plain old Java objects" (POJOs) based on a Metaschema.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.codegen.binding  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.codegen.binding.config
Support for customizing how Java code is generated for one or more specific Metaschemas.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.maven.plugin  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model
Support for loading Metaschema information from an XML-based Metaschema model.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common
Provides interfaces, abstract implementation classes, and exceptions that are used in Metaschema APIs for processing Metaschema-based models.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.configuration  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.constraint
Support for validating bound objects using Metaschema constraints.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype
The Metaschema and Metapath data type system API.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype.adapter
Built-in Metaschema data types.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype.markup
Data type support for HTML and Markdown markup.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype.markup.flexmark
Support for parsing HTML and Markdown text used in Metaschema fields using Flexmark.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype.object
Bound objects used by the Metaschema type system.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.metapath
Support for working with Metapath expressions.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.metapath.format
Support for defining and evaluating Metapath functions.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.metapath.function
Support for rendering paths to bound object nodes and Metaschema definitions resulting from evaluating a Metapath.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.metapath.function.library
Built-in Metapath functions based on the XPath 3.1 specification.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.metapath.item
The Metapath type system, which overlays the Metaschema type system defined in gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.datatype.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.util
Various utilities and helper methods.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.common.validation
Provides content validation support.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.model.testing  
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen
Abstract support for schema generation.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.datatype
Abstract support for managing Metaschema data type implementations aligned with a given schema format for use in schema generation.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.json
Provides JSON Schema generation capabilities based on a provided Metaschema.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.json.datatype
Support for managing Metaschema data type implementations aligned with the JSON schema format for use in schema generation.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.json.property

Provides XML Schema generation capabilities based on a provided Metaschema.

Support for managing Metaschema data type implementations aligned with the XML schema format for use in schema generation.
